remarks: Lemma for ~ dchrisum .  Lemma 9.4.1 of [Shapiro], p. 377. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-May-2016.)
statement:
rpvmasum.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
rpvmasum.l $e |- L = ( ZRHom ` Z ) $.
rpvmasum.a $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
rpvmasum.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
rpvmasum.d $e |- D = ( Base ` G ) $.
rpvmasum.1 $e |- .1. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
dchrisum.b $e |- ( ph -> X e. D ) $.
dchrisum.n1 $e |- ( ph -> X =/= .1. ) $.
dchrisum.2 $e |- ( n = x -> A = B ) $.
dchrisum.3 $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN ) $.
dchrisum.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ n e. RR+ ) -> A e. RR ) $.
dchrisum.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( n e. RR+ /\ x e. RR+ ) /\ ( M <_ n /\ n <_ x ) ) -> B <_ A ) $.
dchrisum.6 $e |- ( ph -> ( n e. RR+ |-> A ) ~~>r 0 ) $.
dchrisum.7 $e |- F = ( n e. NN |-> ( ( X ` ( L ` n ) ) x. A ) ) $.
dchrisumlema $p |- ( ph -> ( ( I e. RR+ -> [_ I / n ]_ A e. RR ) /\ ( I e. ( M [,) +oo ) -> 0 <_ [_ I / n ]_ A ) ) ) $.
$d .1. n x $.
$d A x $.
$d B n $.
$d D n x $.
$d F n x $.
$d I n x $.
$d L n x $.
$d M n x $.
$d N n x $.
$d X n x $.
$d Z n x $.
$d n ph x $.
$d n x $.
$d n x $.
$d n x $.
$d n x $.
$d n x $.
$d n x $.
$d n x $.
$d n x $.
